# Delete an order using the Zuora application

This topic explains how to delete an order in the Zuora application by following a series of steps.

To delete an order in the Zuora application, complete the following steps:

1.  Navigate to Customers > Orders. The Orders page opens and lists the orders in your tenant.
2.  To quickly search for an order, use the following techniques:

    -   Specify a time range for the order create date to filter the displayed orders. To do this, click the Search orders icon at the top right and then specify the dates in the displayed filter.

        ![order date range](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/6a51a5f8-f616-47c2-8505-bd4a49713255?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..OFY55VbbdiFrvbIBUGwUOepaMxNvkX9dfi9h2sEDCrU)

    -   Search for the order by using the account number, order number, or subscription number. To do this, click the down arrow to select which number to search for and then type the number in the search field. The result will dynamically change as you type.

        ![search order](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/b38c5f9b-ab22-427a-9937-d05b18862669?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..IeTIn5HUunWIGZhcF-t3Dntv4VotgJDIinXUUIgv6Z8)


3.  (Optional): To view the summary of an order, click the right arrow ( > ) next to the order number.
4.  To delete the order, on the right side of the order line, click the Delete Order icon ![delete-order-icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/56f0aad7-e407-4522-8edd-530b776b136f?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Nmk4Ek7jq9sTLFac_2ioJGQ0Lu7Yx9_-RPIKvgQVeH8) .
